definition: to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook
to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]
to fondle the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
lit. to pick the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/fig. to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
to make a mess/to mess with/to be wild/to sleep around/to jump into bed
to hang around/to fool around/to live aimlessly
(of a woman) to take a lover
lit. to enjoy the beautiful spring scenery (idiom)/fig. to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats

pinyin: luan4 gao3 nan2 nu:3 guan1 xi4

definition: (of a flower) to attract bees and butterflies/(fig.) to attract the opposite sex/to flirt
to mess around/to mess with something/to have an affair
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
